ComicInfo.Penciller: Andy Smith,Bill Sienkiewicz,Keith Giffen,Andy Smith,Keith Giffen
ComicInfo.Summary: The Martians launch their invasion of Earth by taking out a satellite and destroying 76.3% of Earth's military. Earth's superheroes begin to notice the attack: Grunge and Caitlan Fairchild see reports on the television in California; Spawn defends his alley friends from giant insects in New York; Savage Dragon and Superpatriot rescue Alex Wilde on the streets of Chicago; and President Clinton calls Jacob Marlowe to ask for the WildC.A.T.S. assistance. The Martians discuss that if they face too much trouble from Earth's heroes they will promise peace if they surrender their superheroes.
